description:
An efficient and professional remote desktop control solution


Fixed a data transmission crash on single-core devices.
Fixed video stutter during the first 3 seconds after a successful connection.
Fixed a latency spike at 30–40 seconds on IPv6 connections.
Disabled Adaptive Quality evaluation in LAN environments.
Optimized stuttering under high load on certain NVIDIA GPUs.
Shortened detection time for the device “no display” state.
source: 上海控控科技有限公司
